mapper.select: SELECT BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, BUSSTOPORDER AS busStopOrder, BUSSTOP AS busStop, BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude, BUSSTOPLINE as busStopLine FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY AS BDC INNER JOIN BUSSTOP B ON B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = BDC.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = #{bseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BUSSTOP SET BUSSTOP = #{busStop}, BUSSTOPLATITUDE = #{busStopLatitude}, BUSSTOPLONGITUDE = #{busStopLongitude}, BUSSTOPLINE = #{busStopLine}, BUSSTOPORDER = #{busStopOrder}, BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = #{busStopDetailCategorySeq} WHERE BUSSTOPSEQ = #{busStopSeq};
UPDATE LOCATION SET BUSSTOPSEQ = NULL where BUSSTOPSEQ = #{seq};
